channel.title: Lisp on barakyo
channel.description: Recent content in Lisp on barakyo

item.title: Elisper: Lisp In Elixir
item.description: I recently read a really interesting and great blog post titled Lisp in your Language by Dan Prince. The article walked through an implementation of a subset of Lisp. After reading the post, I thought it was a great project to not only have a deeper understanding of Lisp but also of the language that the implementation is in. In fact, I was so inspired by the post, I decided that maybe I’d give it a shot to write it in Elixir.
